title: The title must not be longer than 128 characters.
location: Choose a location or create a new one.
startDate: Enter the start time of the event.
endDate: Enter the end time of the event
ticketNum: The maximum number of tickets is 5000.
ticketPrice: Ticket price in RSD. The ticket price must not exceed 5000 RSD.
pic: Supported image formats are JPEG and PNG.
desc: Description must not be longer than 2048 characters.
deleteEvent: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
cancelEvent: Are you sure you want to cancel this event?
deletePost: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
deleteLocation: Are you sure you want to delete this location?
deleteComment: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
banStudent: Are you sure you want to ban this student?
unbanStudent: Are you sure you want to unban this student?
promoteToAdmin: Are you sure you want to promote this student to admin?
promoteToUniAdmin: Are you sure you want to promote this student to university admin?
promoteToParMember: Are you sure you want to promote this student to parlament member?
deleteStudent: Are you sure you want to delete this student's account?
cancelResConf: Are you sure you want to cancel your reservation for this event? This action is irreversible, you will not be able to reserve tickets for this event again.
